short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Guardian. News, sport and opinion from the Guardian's UK edition

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser Extension is a Notifier which informs you about updates in The Guardian UK edition. Follow new publications and news without checking the website all the time.

Latest news, sport, business, comment, analysis and reviews from the Guardian, the world's leading liberal voice. 
Only Hot and Breaking news on your fingertips:
•	UK politics
•	UK news
•	Scotland
•	Society
•	Law
•	Northern Ireland
